flawed_nl_solution:
Radhika was given 12 video games on Christmas and 8 video games on her birthday, so she was given 12 + 8 = <<12+8=18>>18 video games.
She had 1/2 this many before she was given gifts, 18 / 2 = <<18/2=9>>9 video games she already owned.
She was given 18 video games and had 9 already, 18 + 9 = <<18+9=27>>27 video games.
#### 27

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 18. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
